title: Pacification sejm
text: Pacification sejm () refers to a type of the <a href="sejm">sejm</a> (parliament session) in the <a href="Polish%E2%80%93Lithuanian%20Commonwealth">Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth</a>. The pacification sejms were held after a period of conflict to bring peace and unity to the country, usually after a disputed <a href="royal%20election">royal election</a>. Pacification sejms were held in <a href="Pacification%20Sejm%20%281589%29">1589</a>, <a href="Pacification%20Sejm%20%281673%29">1673</a>, <a href="Pacification%20Sejm%20%281698%29">1698</a>, <a href="Pacification%20Sejm%20%281699%29">1699</a>, <a href="Pacification%20Sejm%20%281717%29">1717</a> and <a href="Pacification%20Sejm%20%281736%29">1736</a>.
